methodology: PR curve analysis, F2 optimization, recall>=90% floor

PERSON.rationale: Threshold 0.30 maximizes F2=92.4% while maintaining recall>=90%. Achieves P=73.3%, R=98.9%. (tie-break: higher recall preferred)

PHONE_NUMBER.rationale: No threshold achieves 90% recall floor. Using threshold 0.30 for maximum recall=75.7%. Pattern improvements required (Phase 4).

EMAIL_ADDRESS.rationale: Threshold 0.30 maximizes F2=100.0% while maintaining recall>=90%. Achieves P=100.0%, R=100.0%. (tie-break: higher recall preferred)

DATE_TIME.rationale: Threshold 0.30 maximizes F2=71.0% while maintaining recall>=90%. Achieves P=35.3%, R=95.1%. (tie-break: higher recall preferred)

LOCATION.rationale: No threshold achieves 90% recall floor. Using threshold 0.30 for maximum recall=20.0%. Pattern improvements required (Phase 4).

MEDICAL_RECORD_NUMBER.rationale: No threshold achieves 90% recall floor. Using threshold 0.30 for maximum recall=72.3%. Pattern improvements required (Phase 4).

ROOM.rationale: No threshold achieves 90% recall floor. Using threshold 0.30 for maximum recall=32.1%. Pattern improvements required (Phase 4).

PEDIATRIC_AGE.rationale: No threshold achieves 90% recall floor. Using threshold 0.30 for maximum recall=35.8%. Pattern improvements required (Phase 4).
